simpleCap <- function(x) {
  s <- strsplit(x, " ")[[1]]
  paste(toupper(substring(s, 1,1)), substring(s, 2),
        sep="", collapse=" ")
}

simpleLow <- function(x) {
  s <- strsplit(x, " ")[[1]]
  paste(substring(s, 1,1), tolower(substring(s, 2)),
        sep="", collapse=" ")
}

a = sapply(female, simpleLow)

dput(unname(a))
